startPage.title: Before you start
startPage.description: We're building a new service. Different designs are being tested and changed based on feedback from users.
startPage.eligibilityText: You'll be asked some questions to check you're eligible to use this service.
startPage.whatYouNeedText: To make your claim, you'll need the following information to hand:
startPage.needNoticeInfo: Information about the type of notice you've given and when it was given (if applicable)
startPage.needPropertyInfo: Details about the property you'd like to claim possession of
startPage.needGroundsInfo: Your grounds for possession and details about your reasons for making a possession claim

page3.title: What are your grounds for possession?
page3.description: Select all grounds that apply to your case

rentArrears8.hint: The tenant owes at least 2 months' rent

breachContract9.hint: The tenant has broken terms of the tenancy agreement

page5.title: Enter your personal and contact details

date.notRealDate: Enter a valid date of birth

summary.title: Check your answers
summary.description: Review your answers before submitting your claim

confirmation.title: Application complete
confirmation.sentEmail: We have sent you a confirmation email.
confirmation.whatNext1: Your possession claim will be reviewed by the court.
confirmation.whatNext2: You will be contacted within 5 working days with next steps.

ineligible.title: You are not eligible to make a claim
ineligible.reason: You need to be 18 or over to make a possession claim.
ineligible.changeAnswer: If you think this is incorrect, you can go back and change your answer.
